data.prayer: Father, help the 97 believers in Burdur to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Burdur, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Burdur.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Burdur, Turkey.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
the state of Burdur has (about) 97 people who know Jesus, 1,440 people who know about him culturally, and 255,763 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Burdur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Bosniak people.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Burdur, Turkey to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 97 believers in the state of Burdur to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.section_summary:
the state of Burdur, Turkey has a population of 257,300.

We estimate Burdur has 97 people who might know Jesus, 1,440 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 255,763 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,652 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 97 believers in the state of Burdur into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;
